application.name: External File Storage - Azure File Service Connector

member.name: O:Page::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Account
member.summary: Displays an account that was registered via the File Share connector.

member.name: O:Table::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Account
member.summary: Holds the information for all file accounts that are registered via the File Share connector

member.name: O:Page::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Account Wizard
member.summary: Displays an account that is being registered via the File Share connector.

member.name: O:EnumExtension::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector
member.summary: Enum extension to register the File Share connector.

member.name: E:EnumExtension::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector.File Share
member.summary: The File Share connector.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.ListFiles(Guid,Text,Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#File Pagination Data,File Account Content@)
member.summary: Gets a List of Files stored on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to get the file.
The file path to list.
Defines the pagination data.
A list with all files stored in the path.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.GetFile(Guid,Text,InStream)
member.summary: Gets a file from the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to get the file.
The file path inside the file account.
The Stream were the file is read to.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.CreateFile(Guid,Text,InStream)
member.summary: Create a file in the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The file path inside the file account.
The Stream were the file is read from.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.CopyFile(Guid,Text,Text)
member.summary: Copies as file inside the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The source file path.
The target file path.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.MoveFile(Guid,Text,Text)
member.summary: Move as file inside the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The source file path.
The target file path.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.FileExists(Guid,Text):Boolean
member.summary: Checks if a file exists on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The file path inside the file account.
member.returns: Returns true if the file exists

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.DeleteFile(Guid,Text)
member.summary: Deletes a file exists on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The file path inside the file account.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.ListDirectories(Guid,Text,Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#File Pagination Data,File Account Content@)
member.summary: Gets a List of Directories stored on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to get the file.
The file path to list.
Defines the pagination data.
A list with all directories stored in the path.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.CreateDirectory(Guid,Text)
member.summary: Creates a directory on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The directory path inside the file account.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.DirectoryExists(Guid,Text):Boolean
member.summary: Checks if a directory exists on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The directory path inside the file account.
member.returns: Returns true if the directory exists

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.DeleteDirectory(Guid,Text)
member.summary: Deletes a directory exists on the provided account.
member.param: The file account ID which is used to send out the file.
The directory path inside the file account.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.GetAccounts(File Account@)
member.summary: Gets the registered accounts for the File Share connector.
member.param: Out parameter holding all the registered accounts for the File Share connector.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.ShowAccountInformation(Guid)
member.summary: Shows accounts information.
member.param: The ID of the account to show.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.RegisterAccount(File Account@):Boolean
member.summary: Register an file account for the File Share connector.
member.param: Out parameter holding details of the registered account.
member.returns: True if the registration was successful; false - otherwise.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.DeleteAccount(Guid):Boolean
member.summary: Deletes an file account for the File Share connector.
member.param: The ID of the File Share account
member.returns: True if an account was deleted.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#ExternalFileStorage#Ext# File Share Connector Impl.GetDescription:Text[250]
